faqList.head: Why won't my vape charge?
faqList.body:
– We recommend that you drain the battery first time using the device then charge it to full power.

– Wiggle the device to see if it makes a clear connection with the USB Charging Dock.

faqList.head: Why should I avoid upsidedown my vape?
faqList.body:
We recommend you to not keep your vape upside down when vaping or not in use.
This is to prevent the condensation from entering into mouth and create bad experience.

faqList.head: Can I bring vapes on a plane?
faqList.body: Where you can bring vapes/e-cigarettes on a plane depends on which country you are taking the plane. In the U.S., vapes are allowed to be carried with us to airport and plane. Just carefully with the battery and e-liquid volume when carrying vapes with you.

faqList.head: About E-juice: What're the ingredients?
faqList.body: Vegetable glycerin (aka VG), propylene glycol(aka PG), nicotine salt, natural and artificial flavorings.

faqList.head: Charging your M Bar vape?
faqList.body: For different vaping products, there will be different indicators showing fully charged status.

itemList.head: Who can't use vape?
itemList.body:
Vape is not suitable for:

– Persons with an overactive thyroid gland or experiencing phaeochromocytoma (a tumor of the adrenal gland that can affect blood pressure)

Please do not use if you are under 18 years old/during pregnancy/breastfeeding/allergic to alcohols/heart disease/ stomachache/duode nalulcers/liver or kidney problems/long-term throat disease/difficult breathing due to bronchitis/emphysema/asthma.

Stop using immediately if experience the following results. Please consult a healthcare professional if necessary:

– Feeling faint / Nausea / Dizziness / Headache / Coughing / Irritation of the mouth or throat / Stomach discomfort / Hiccups / Nasal congestion / Vomiting / Chest palpitation / Pain or an irregular heart rate.

itemList.head: Can I bring vapes on a plane?
itemList.body:
Where you can bring vapes/e-cigarettes on a plane depends on which country you are taking the plane. In the U.S., vapes are allowed to be carried with us to airport and plane. Just carefully with the battery and e-liquid volume when carrying vapes with you.

For other countries’ regulations on carying vapes on a plane, please go to their official sites or the sites of the specific airline you are taking.

itemList.head: What are the types of vapes?
itemList.body:
There are so many types of vapes out in the market.

Disposable vapes are the simplest vapes in construct and operation. They are easy to use, and can be threw away after use.

Vape pens/pod mods require vapers to do some learning, such as filling the pod, pressing buttons, or changing the prefilled vape pods. Vape pens and pod mods are great choices for vape beginners or vapers who want everything to be more convenient compared to mods.

Mods are the most complicated vapes, which produce larger smoke and denser flavor with the sub-ohm coils. Some of them can be DIYed by wiring your own coils, using your own cottons, and setting your preferred temperature. Mods allows wider free space for vapers to gain bigger clouds, warmer flavors, and more.

pageNotice.title: Important announce
pageNotice.subtitle: Dear consumers
pageNotice.description1: Recently, there have been some cases of counterfeit products of our company in the market, which has drawn our high attention. To protect your rights, interests, and health, we are issuing this announcement to solemnly declare that all products manufactured by our company are produced in strict accordance with relevant safety standards and have undergone multiple strict quality inspection procedures to ensure that we provide you with safe, reliable, and high – quality products.
pageNotice.description2: We deeply understand the significance of product quality and safety to consumers. Each product embodies our persistent pursuit of quality and our sense of responsibility towards consumers.
pageNotice.description3: However, counterfeit products can neither guarantee quality nor safety and may also have serious quality problems and potential safety hazards. Using counterfeit products can cause harm to your physical health. These counterfeit products often cut corners in terms of raw materials, production processes, etc. They may contain harmful substances or do not conform to ergonomic design and may cause various adverse reactions and health problems during use.
pageNotice.description4: For the health and safety of you and your family, when purchasing products, please be sure to carefully identify them and choose regular sales channels and authorized dealers. You can identify the authenticity by checking anti – counterfeiting marks, official certification marks on the product packaging, etc. At the same time, we also recommend that you remain vigilant. Click toidentify the authenticityof your product.
pageNotice.description5: We will continue to devote ourselves to providing safe and reliable products for everyone, and constantly improve product quality and service level. It will also strengthen the market supervision, and resolutely safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of consumers and the good reputation of the company.
pageNotice.description6: We will also strengthen market supervision and anti – counterfeiting efforts to firmly safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of consumers and the good reputation of the company. At the same time, we also thank the vast number of consumers for your long – term support and trust in us. We hope that you will continue to choose our company’s products and jointly create a healthy, safe, and orderly consumption environment.
pageNotice.description7: Once again, we remind everyone to carefully identify products when purchasing and never buy counterfeit products. If you have any questions or need further information about the products, please feel free to contact our customer service team (info{'@'}salthub.com). We will serve you wholeheartedly.
